content: Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 07 Oct 2018How do you assess Industrial REITs?Besides the price to book ratio and DPU, what indicators do you look at for REITs in the industrial line? Is there any indicator specific to the industrial sector? Thank you!1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Jonathan Chia Guangrong, Fund Manager at JCG FundLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 07 Oct 2018Consider the yield and gearing ratio. Look at the quality of the sponsors, and consistency of the distribution. I personally like Aims Amp and have been invested in it for a number of years. The dpu is quite consistent and their tenants are good. They also do build to suit, which is great. 0 comments1
